mapper.insert: insert into adoption_reply(rno, bno, reply, id) values (seq_replyAR.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{id})
mapper.update: update adoption_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, id, replydate, updatedate from adoption_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
